attributes.action: Close schools because of covid cases rising.
attributes.additional_details: I want this because covid cases are rising and by schools being open, it gives more risk to the children and teachers.
attributes.background: I need you to close schools for ATLEAST a week or more because covid cases are rising.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/599364
